# ***R concept***
1. assignment  
similar to asignment of other languages.  
can use symbols `=` or `<=`  

1. datatype  
common data type: numeric, logical, character  
method `mode()` shows the data type  
character is string or character like python, denoted by double quote " or single quote no diff 
logical is `TRUE` and `FALSE`, you write can also `T` and `F`

1. indexing  
all indexing in R is from 1 not 0  
the slicing (eg 1:3): start and end are included
